imdb.plot outline: A group of way too clever thieves and oddballs decide to copycat a series of high end robberies in Santa Monica and make off with well insured goods. Pretending to be the infamous Knock Knock gang they knock, enter, and get away with electronics, wine, some art, and the Porsche. Unfortunately they've ripped off a brilliant compulsive lunatic whose own business dealings have damaged the U.S. and global economy and yet tripled his earnings. His stolen linear drawings are everything to him. He is going to get his art back. The Knock Knock gang finds out who pulled that heist, and comes after their imitators. Our friends have stumbled into a sticky situation.
imdb.title: Spiderweb
